def transform(sequence):
    sequence = list(sequence)
    f = sequence.index('9')
    return sequence[f+8:] + [sequence[f]] + sequence[f+1:f+8] + sequence[:f]

def transform(sequence):
    sequence = list(sequence)
    f = sequence.index('9')
    return sequence[f+8:] + [sequence[f]] + sequence[f+1:f+8] + sequence[:f]
